Summary: Redish Orange sphere changes color then multiplies
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailswe were at a soccer game when my daughter saw something dropping in the sky and asked me what it was. i looked at it drop then stop and start moving in a figure 8 motion so i grabbed my phone and recorded what i saw. i turned several colors and is started to shoot out more orbs\spheres at one time i counted as many as 8 in the sky at one time.
